import React, {useState,useRef} from 'react'; // import ReactQuill from 'react-quill'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import LoadingOverlay from 'react-loading-overlay' import AdminLayout from '../components/AdminLayout'; // import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css' const LOGIN_API = "https://6j0n7kx92c.execute-api.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/dev/api/login" const Login = () => { const [username,setUsername] = useState(""); const [password,setPassword] = useState(""); const [isLoading,setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [error,setError] = useState(null); const handleChange=(value)=>{ console.log("value ",value) setContent(value); } const login = () =>{ if(username==""||password==""){ setError("please complete the form and try again") }else{ console.log("username and password ", username, password) setIsLoading(true) fetch(LOGIN_API, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ username: username, password: password }) }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data =>{ console.log(data); setIsLoading(false) }) .catch(error =>{ setIsLoading(false) console.log(error) }) } } return(

) } export default Login;
